IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY BY OPERATING AN INVESTMENT FUND.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY BY OPERATING AN INVESTMENT FUND.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION INVESTS FUNDS OF THE NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY ENDOWMENT FUND AND OTHER UNIVERSITY-RELATED ENTITIES.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ENDOWMENT FUND OF NC STATE UNIVERSITY

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: NC STATE INVESTMENT FUND, INC. SUPPORTS NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY EXCLUSIVELY BY INVESTING THE FUNDS OF THE NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY ENDOWMENT FUND AND OTHER UNIVERSITY RELATED ENTITIES.

SIX EX-OFFICIO MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF NC STATE INVESTMENT FUND ARE OFFICERS OF NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY, THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION. OTHER MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE APPOINTED BASED ON THEIR MEMBERSHIP ON OTHER BOARDS AFFILIATED WITH NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT HAS ANALYZED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE FUND, AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF JUNE 30, 2018, THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY (OR ASSET) OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
Unrelated business income from investment partnerships 94,610.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ENDOWMENT FUND OF NC STATE UNIVERSITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS REPRESENT PARTICIPANT WITHDRAWALS FROM THE NC STATE INVESTMENT FUND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DRAFT 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO BOARD MEMBERS FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD REQUIRES EACH BOARD MEMBER, OFFICER AND AGENTS ACTING ON BEHALF OF THE INVESTMENT FUND (1) TO REVIEW THE FUND'S BYLAWS AND POLICIES INCLUDING THE POLICY WITH REGARD TO CONFLICT OF INTEREST; (2) TO DISCLOSE ON AN ONGOING BASIS THROUGHOUT THEIR TENURE ANY POSSIBLE PERSONAL, FAMILIAL OR BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO A CONFLICT OF INTEREST INVOLVING THE FUND; AND (3) TO ACKNOWLEDGE BY THEIR SIGNATURE THAT THEY ARE IN FULL ACCORD AND WILL ABIDE BY BOTH THE LETTER AND SPIRIT OF THE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS OF NC STATE INVESTMENT FUND, INC THAT DO RECEIVE COMPENSATION ARE COMPENSATED BY NC STATE UNIVERSITY, A 170(C)(1) ORGANIZATION RELATED TO NC STATE INVESTMENT FUND, INC. NC STATE UNIVERSITY SETS THE COMPENSATION OF THESE EMPLOYEES BY ACQUIRING COMPARABILITY DATA WHICH IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY INDEPENDENT PERSONS WITH CONTEMPORANEOUS SUBSTANTIATION OF THE DECISION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE WEBSITE (HTTP://FOUNDATIONSACCOUNTING.OFA.NCSU.EDU/INVESTMENT-FUND). OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS LISTED ON THE WEBSITE. FORM 1023 IS MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART XI, LINE 9, CHANGES IN NET ASSETS:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME FROM INVESTMENT PARTNERSHIPS (94,610).

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NORTH CAROLINA STATE UNIVERSITY FDN INC
NC STATE UNIVERSITY COLLEGE OF SCIENCES
